item.title: Making mod/admin glows
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

The first are variables, so I’d say declare them.
The second are if-statements, I believe belonging to the customCommand() method.
The third… I have no idea where that belongs, my only bet is in process()… sigh.

Read full topic

item.title: Making mod/admin glows
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

the code for it is here but idk where to put;

1st code

public boolean adglow = false;
public boolean pmodglow = false;
public boolean ownerglow = false;
public boolean champglow = false;

2nd code

    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglow") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = true;
    }

//Narbmark: GCHAMP
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“champglow”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Liam”))
{
champglow = true;
}

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noglow") && playerRights >= 1)
    {
           pmodglow =false;
           adglow =false;
           ownerglow =false;
           champglow =false;
    }
    
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("nomodglow") && playerRights >= 1)
    {
           pmodglow =false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noadminglow") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noownerglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = false;
    }
    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("nochampglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           champglow = false;

3rd code.

if (adglow == true) {//Admin Glow
stillgfx(246, absY, absX);
}
if (pmodglow == true) {//PMod Glow
stillgfx(247, absY, absX);
}
if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow
stillgfx(601, absY, absX);
}
if (champglow == true) {//Champ Glow
stillgfx(281, absY, absX);

So my problem persists on how and where to put it
